response.overview: Goosebumps: One Day at HorrorLand follows the lost Morris family (parents Carl & Peggy, kids Lizzy & Luke, plus friend Clay) who stumble upon the mysterious HorrorLand, a monster-run amusement park where admission is free but the fun is deadly, featuring terrifying rides like the Doom Slide and Coffin Cruise, forcing them to escape deadly traps and a monster-hosted game show to survive the day and get home.
response.title: Goosebumps: One Day at HorrorLand
